attributes.action: legalize cannabis in the united kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: cannabis will only get stronger whilst it is in the hands of criminals. making it illegal is doing the opposite of what the government say. also, more and more green is being contaminated with substances such as silicone, which when smoked, can cause serious lung problems. mental health isnt the time bomb here. that can be controlled by the amount of thc a plant produces thus controlling the STRENGTH... its what the dutch do! i urge every citizen to sign this petition. The benefits of this are too great to be ignored any longer. the taxation of cannabis let alone the boost of tourism and the economy would do this country good
